title: Earthquake simulation drill to take place Thursday (Oct. 15) (Purdue University)
text: ( Source : Purdue University ) WEST LAFAYETTE, Ind. - The Purdue University community is encouraged to participate Thursday (Oct. 15) in a campus drill simulating a major earthquake. The exercise is designed to educate faculty, staff and
